thread.title: MJs kids celebrate Jacksons third generation docuseries
thread.title_full: MJs kids celebrate Jacksons third generation docuseries

title: MJs kids celebrate Jacksons third generation docuseries
text:
MJ's kids celebrate Jacksons' third generation docuseries 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Sunday 4th October, 2015 
The late singing sensation Michael Jackson's kids Paris, Prince and Blanket gathered at a Hollywood sports bar to celebrate the premiere of 'The Jacksons: Next Generations,' which is a reality show focusing on the third generation of Jacksons. 
The docuseries features the members of music group 3T, Taryll, TJ, Taj, as they work to balance a career and their lives as traditional family men while living up to the pressures and demands that comes with their last name, TMZ.com reported. 
The series, which got premiered on October 2 and has in total six episodes, is executive produced by Henry Capanna, Julie Auerbach, Tina Gazzerro, Dennis Principe, Taj Jackson, Taryll Jackson, TJ Jackson, Megan McGuiness and Henri Hebert. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News MJs     Olivia
